name: GetModuleQueue
description: Obtains the Module Queue for Incomplete Failed Actions

parameters.Description: The id of the service to load. Used in conjunction with $serviceType
The type of service to load ('domain', 'service', 'addon' or ''))
The module name to obtain the queue for in system format. eg cpanel
The module action to obtain the queue for. eg CreateAccount, SuspendAccount
The date/time since to obtain the items. Format Y-m-d Can include H:i:s
